February U, 1955
Mr. LoreÂ® B. Stone, Manager
Station KCTS-TV
Channel 9
Community Television Service
University of Washington
Seattle 5, Washington
Dear Lorens
Thank you very much for your letter on the labor situation. I'm
sending a copy on to Norik. He will agree with bo, I think, that we should
do nothing to rook the boat, and should do all possible to see that your
operation is not prejudiced by other agreements as well.
Not all areas are so fortunate.
All our very best to you all.
Sincerely,
HJSicr
Harry J. Skoraia
Executive Director
